sub_title: Executive Director Lotus Cars Europe B.V. at Group Lotus
summary:
Car Guy, who happens to be an All-round Director/Manager, Creative Thinker and Strategist, with a proven (general management / marketing / sales) track record in local, regional and global Automotive industry. 


Passionate about sustainable growth, brand-building and people development.

Specialties: 
Automotive / Transport Industry - General Management
Sales
Innovation / Change Management
Marketing Management
Advertising
Brand Management
Product Management
